resources.string: When this service is enabled it can display using Camera and Mic what Apps are accessing times \n\nThis Service/App doesn\'t have any permission to use internet or your device\'s camera, microphone or any other Hardware. And will NOT gather any data whatsoever.
Get notified every time a third-party app or a service uses camera or microphone. Inspired from ios14 recording indicators.
Get notified every time a third-party app uses Camera or Mic and check using time

I am a student, tutor, engineer and a maker to various projects. For 3+ years, I have been working on Open Source.\n\n If you use any of my projects or like what I\'m doing, please consider backing me with simple donations so that I can continue my open source work.

The current build of the app is still in beta, and not extensively tested on various devices.\n\n If you find any issue or would like to request a feature feel free to use the below button and open an issue on the GitHub Repository.
You will get an active notification on the status bar while an app is using your camera or microphone.
